OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN; narrow-based index; broad-based index; volatility index (listed options)
RequirementText: Must be fully paid (100% premium).

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN; narrow-based index; broad-based index; volatility index (listed options)
RequirementText: Must be fully paid (100% premium).
Notes: No additional cash beyond premium cost required.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN; narrow-based index; broad-based index; volatility index (listed options)
RequirementText: No margin/loan value (margin requirement = 0).
Notes: Long options do not provide loan value in a margin account once <= 9 months to expiration.

OptionType: All option types (cash account purchase permitted; margin eligibility limits apply only to margin accounts)
RequirementText: Must be fully paid (100% premium).

OptionType: Equity; ETF; equity-based narrow/broad index; volatility index (listed options only; ETF/index must be equity-based)
RequirementText: Initial = 75% of premium (purchase cost).
Notes: Option ceases to have margin value once time to expiry reaches 9 months.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; equity-based narrow/broad index; volatility index (listed options only; ETF/index must be equity-based)
RequirementText: Maintenance = 75% of current option market value.
Notes: Option ceases to have margin value once time to expiry reaches 9 months.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; equity-based narrow/broad index; volatility index (OTC; ETF/index must be equity-based)
RequirementText: Initial = 75% * intrinsic value + 100% * (premium - intrinsic). If intrinsic is 0, must be fully paid.
Notes: OTC option must be American-style and guaranteed by carrying broker-dealer. Option ceases to have margin value once time to expiry reaches 9 months.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; equity-based narrow/broad index; volatility index (OTC; ETF/index must be equity-based)
RequirementText: Maintenance = 75% * intrinsic value (no loan value otherwise).
Notes: OTC option must be American-style and guaranteed by carrying broker-dealer. Option ceases to have margin value once time to expiry reaches 9 months.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN tracking a narrow-based index; ETN tracking a broad-based index; narrow-based index; volatility index
RequirementText: Put: hold cash/cash equivalents = aggregate strike value OR escrow. Call: hold underlying OR escrow.
Notes: Sale proceeds held until deposit made.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN tracking a narrow-based index; ETN tracking a broad-based index; narrow-based index; volatility index
RequirementText: Initial = option proceeds + max( 20%*UnderlyingValue - OTM , Minimum ). Minimum for calls = 10%*UnderlyingValue; minimum for puts = 10%*StrikeValue.
Notes: OTM = out-of-the-money amount. For puts, minimum uses strike value.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN tracking a narrow-based index; ETN tracking a broad-based index; narrow-based index; volatility index
RequirementText: Maintenance = option market value + max( 20%*UnderlyingValue - OTM , Minimum ). Minimum for calls = 10%*UnderlyingValue; minimum for puts = 10%*StrikeValue.

OptionType: Leveraged ETF (narrow-based); leveraged ETN tracking a broad-based index
RequirementText: Same as SH_OPT but multiply the 20% and 10% factors by leverage factor.
Notes: Circular RG09-097 referenced for heightened requirements.

OptionType: Leveraged ETF (narrow-based); leveraged ETN tracking a broad-based index
RequirementText: Same as SH_OPT maintenance but multiply the 20% and 10% factors by leverage factor.

OptionType: ETF tracking a broad-based index; broad-based index
RequirementText: Put: hold cash/cash equivalents = aggregate strike value OR escrow. Call: escrow.

OptionType: ETF tracking a broad-based index; broad-based index
RequirementText: Initial = option proceeds + max( 15%*IndexValue - OTM , Minimum ). Minimum for calls = 10%*IndexValue; minimum for puts = 10%*StrikeValue.

OptionType: ETF tracking a broad-based index; broad-based index
RequirementText: Maintenance = option market value + max( 15%*IndexValue - OTM , Minimum ). Minimum for calls = 10%*IndexValue; minimum for puts = 10%*StrikeValue.

OptionType: Leveraged ETF tracking a broad-based index
RequirementText: Same as SH_OPT_BROAD but multiply the 15% and 10% factors by leverage factor.

OptionType: Leveraged ETF tracking a broad-based index
RequirementText: Same as SH_OPT_BROAD maintenance but multiply the 15% and 10% factors by leverage factor.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN; narrow-based index; broad-based index; volatility index (listed options)
RequirementText: Escrow required for each short option leg.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN; narrow-based index; broad-based index; volatility index (listed options)
RequirementText: Initial = greater(short put requirement, short call requirement) + proceeds of the other leg (same underlying; same index multiplier if index).
Notes: Compute ShortPutRequirement and ShortCallRequirement per the applicable short option family (20% or 15%).

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN; narrow-based index; broad-based index; volatility index (listed options)
RequirementText: Maintenance = greater(short put requirement, short call requirement) + market value of the other leg.
Notes: Compute ShortPutRequirement and ShortCallRequirement per the applicable short option family (20% or 15%), using current option market value for the uncovered side.

OptionType: All listed option types (listed or OTC if spread conditions met)
RequirementText: If spread meets conditions (same underlying; all American or all European; all listed or all OTC; equal aggregate underlying; short expires on/before long): Initial = lesser of (short-leg requirement, MaxPotentialLoss). Long legs must be fully paid; short proceeds may apply.
Notes: Cash account spreads restricted to European cash-settled index options with same expiration.

OptionType: All listed option types (listed or OTC if spread conditions met)
RequirementText: Maintain initial requirement.

OptionType: European, cash-settled index options (all legs expire same time)
RequirementText: Cash/cash equivalents = MaxPotentialLoss (if any). Long legs fully paid; short proceeds may apply; escrow for cash/cash equivalents permitted.

OptionType: All listed option types
RequirementText: Initial = MaxPotentialLoss; long legs fully paid; short proceeds may apply. Exception: if all legs European and same expiration, eligible loan value up to 50% of aggregate strike differential; box value for margin may be capped at 100% of strike differential.
Notes: If LoanValueEligible, FormulaTemplate returns eligible loan value (not a debit/credit net).

OptionType: All listed option types
RequirementText: Maintain initial requirement.
Notes: If LoanValueEligible, maintain eligible loan value; otherwise maintain LongPremiumPaid + MaxPotentialLoss.

OptionType: European cash-settled index options (all legs expire same time)
RequirementText: Net debit must be fully paid (long sides paid in full; short proceeds may reduce debit).

OptionType: All listed option types
RequirementText: Initial = MaxPotentialLoss; long legs fully paid; short proceeds may apply.
Notes: MaxPotentialLoss computed per MPL method for a 4-leg box is typically the strike differential.

OptionType: All listed option types
RequirementText: Maintain initial requirement.

OptionType: European cash-settled index options (all legs expire same time)
RequirementText: Hold cash/cash equivalents = aggregate strike differential (short proceeds may apply; escrow permitted).

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Not permitted in cash accounts.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Short put has 0 additional requirement; short underlying is margined as normal short sale (Reg T: proceeds + 50% of current value).
Notes: Any amount by which put strike exceeds market adds to initial for excess Reg T equity test.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Short put has 0 additional requirement; short underlying maintenance = normal short-stock requirement, plus add-on for (put strike - market) if positive.
Notes: Normal short-stock maintenance add-on is typically max($5/share, 30% of market value) for stocks >= $5/share; low-price stock rules apply.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN
RequirementText: Underlying must be fully paid; short call has 0 margin requirement.

StrategyName: Covered index call via qualified stock basket (cash)
OptionType: Equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Not permitted in cash accounts.
Notes: Index covered call via qualified basket is margin-only per schedule.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement; long underlying margined at 50% (Reg T).
Notes: If using qualified index basket coverage, basket must be based on same index and basket market value must be at least equal to aggregate current index value.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement; underlying maintenance = 25% of underlying market value.
Notes: For margin equity/loan-value purposes, underlying may be valued at min(market, call strike). Keep equity-valuation cap separate from the maintenance requirement calculation.

StrategyName: Covered index call via long ETF
OptionType: Narrow/broad index options (long ETF tracks same index)
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement if ETF tracks same index and ETF market value >= aggregate current index value; ETF margined at 50%. ETNs/leveraged ETFs/leveraged index mutual funds not permitted.

StrategyName: Covered index call via long ETF
OptionType: Narrow/broad index options (long ETF tracks same index)
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement; ETF maintenance = 25% of ETF market value.
Notes: For margin equity/loan-value purposes, ETF may be valued at min(market, call strike-equivalent). Keep equity-valuation cap separate from the maintenance requirement calculation.

OptionType: Equity
RequirementText: Convertible must be fully paid; short call has 0 requirement.
Notes: Convertible must be immediately convertible, no money payable, and convertible must not expire before short call.

OptionType: Equity
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement; convertible margined at 50% if immediately convertible, no money payable, and convertible does not expire before short call.

OptionType: Equity
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement; convertible maintenance = 25% of convertible market value.
Notes: For margin equity/loan-value purposes, convertible may be valued at min(market, call strike). Keep equity-valuation cap separate from the maintenance requirement calculation.

OptionType: Equity
RequirementText: Short call has 0 requirement; warrant requires 100% (no loan value) + add-on if warrant exercise price > option strike; warrant cannot expire before short call.

OptionType: Equity
RequirementText: Same as initial; warrants valued at the lower of current market value or call exercise price.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for underlying and long put in full (net debit must be fully paid).
Notes: Cash-account establishment assumes both legs opened concurrently; if underlying is already fully paid, incremental cash is the long put premium.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for long put in full; underlying margined at 50% (Reg T).
Notes: Reduced maintenance treatment requires American-style put.

OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Underlying maintenance = min( 10%*PutStrike + 100%*PutOTM , 25%*UnderlyingMarketValue ). Long put must be paid in full; must be American-style for reduced maintenance.

StrategyName: Hedged short stock (short underlying + long call)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Not permitted in cash accounts.

StrategyName: Hedged short stock (short underlying + long call)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for long call in full; short underlying margined as normal short sale (Reg T: proceeds + 50% of current value).
Notes: Reduced maintenance treatment requires American-style call.

StrategyName: Hedged short stock (short underlying + long call)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Short underlying maintenance = lower of (hedged short-stock formula, normal short-stock maintenance). Long call must be paid in full; must be American-style for reduced maintenance.
Notes: Hedged formula (as shown in examples) uses 110%*call strike plus any call OTM amount; compare to normal short-stock maintenance requirement. Also requires maintaining 100% of short security market value at all times.

StrategyName: Conversion (long underlying + long put + short call)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for underlying and long put in full (net debit must be fully paid); short call has 0 requirement.
Notes: Cash-account establishment assumes both long legs opened concurrently; if underlying is already fully paid, incremental cash is the long put premium (net of short call proceeds).

StrategyName: Conversion (long underlying + long put + short call)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for long put in full; short call has 0 requirement; underlying margined at 50% (Reg T).
Notes: Reduced maintenance treatment requires American-style options with same strike/expiration for call and put.

StrategyName: Conversion (long underlying + long put + short call)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Underlying maintenance = 10%*Strike (same strike/expiry for put and call; American-style required). Long option paid in full; no loan value.
Notes: For margin equity/loan-value purposes, underlying may be valued at min(market, call strike). Keep equity-valuation cap separate from the maintenance requirement calculation.

StrategyName: Reverse conversion (short underlying + long call + short put)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Not permitted in cash accounts.

StrategyName: Reverse conversion (short underlying + long call + short put)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Standard Reg T: Pay for long call in full; short put has 0 requirement; short underlying margined as normal short sale (proceeds + 50% of current value).
Notes: If (call is American-style) AND (strike < underlying sale price), reduced Reg T may apply (separate rule row).

StrategyName: Reverse conversion (short underlying + long call + short put) - reduced initial case
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Reduced Reg T (conditional): Pay for long call in full; short put has 0 requirement; short underlying requirement = short sale proceeds + 10%*Strike.
Notes: Applies only if call is American-style AND strike < underlying sale price (per schedule).

StrategyName: Reverse conversion (short underlying + long call + short put)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Short underlying maintenance = 110%*Strike, plus any put in-the-money amount (if Strike > market). Options must share strike/expiry; American-style required; long call paid in full; no loan value.
Notes: Also requires maintaining 100% of short security market value at all times. If not American-style, fall back to 'Short Put and Short Underlying' requirements.

StrategyName: Collar (long underlying + long put + short call; put strike < call strike)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for underlying and long put in full (net debit must be fully paid); short call has 0 requirement.
Notes: Cash-account establishment assumes both long legs opened concurrently; if underlying is already fully paid, incremental cash is long put premium (net of short call proceeds).

StrategyName: Collar (long underlying + long put + short call; put strike < call strike)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Pay for long put in full; short call has 0 requirement; underlying margined at 50% (Reg T).
Notes: Reduced maintenance treatment requires American-style options and same expiration for put and call.

StrategyName: Collar (long underlying + long put + short call; put strike < call strike)
OptionType: Equity/ETF/ETN; equity-based index via qualified basket
RequirementText: Underlying maintenance = min( 10%*PutStrike + PutOTM , 25%*CallStrike ). Options must share expiry; American-style required; long put paid in full; no loan value.
Notes: For margin equity/loan-value purposes, underlying may be valued at min(market, call strike). Keep equity-valuation cap separate from the maintenance requirement calculation.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN
RequirementText: Initial = MaxPotentialLoss (long expires with/after short). Different exercise styles allowed. Long premium fully paid; short proceeds may apply.

OptionType: Index (European + cash-settled only for cash accounts)
RequirementText: Cash acct: both legs European + cash-settled; long expires with short; cash/cash equivalents = MaxPotentialLoss; escrow permitted.

OptionType: Equity; ETF; ETN
RequirementText: Initial = greater(short put requirement, short call requirement) + proceeds of other leg; different exercise styles allowed.
Notes: Compute ShortPutRequirement and ShortCallRequirement per the applicable short option family, using option proceeds for the uncovered side.

OptionType: Index
RequirementText: Same as FLEX short straddle; if settlement determination differs (open vs close) and both expire same day, margin legs separately two business days prior to expiration.
Notes: If open-vs-close settlement differs and both expire same day, treat legs as separately margined starting two business days prior to expiration.

OptionType: All option types with limited risk spreads
RequirementText: Compute intrinsic value at each strike price point in spread; net values; maximum loss is greatest negative net. Margin = MaxPotentialLoss (if any) + long premium paid in full; short proceeds may apply.
Notes: If expirations differ, MPL may only be valid while spread remains intact; assignment/exercise/expiration can require re-margining.

RequirementText: Exchange margin requirements are minimums; firms may impose higher requirements. Reg T timing: initial within 4 business days; maintenance within 15 business days. For maintenance calculations, use current option market value instead of original proceeds. Calendar spreads with European-style (including VIX) may face additional firm margin or be treated as uncovered.
Cash equivalents include U.S. government or agency securities, negotiable bank CDs, banker's acceptances payable in the U.S., and money market mutual funds.

Escrow agreements are bank agreements securing short options: holding underlying (calls) or required cash/cash equivalents (puts), or for cash-settled products holding required cash/cash equivalents and/or qualified equity securities, to satisfy assignment/settlement obligations.
